venue.name: Hess Gas - Intersection Mass Pike, Rt 128, and Commonwealth Ave

item.description:
4th of July activities

Natick is boasting 2 scooter friendly events for the 4th of July, starting at 7AM with the Kiwanis Pancake Breakfast at St. Paul's followed by their 54th Annual Parade in which scooters are welcome!

The parade starts at the 9/27 Plaza and travels down Route 27 to Route 135 in Natick Center.

This Meetup was suggested by Tomasso Stilletto.

Dana of Metrowest scooters says.. "I'm happy to inform everyone that Scooters riding in the parade is being sponsored by Metrowest Scooters. Please visit our website as well to let us know if you'll be riding."

https://www.metrowest...
item.name: Natick 4th of July festivities
